targets.rawSql:
SELECT Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as Monat, Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d') as "Datum max", Einspeisen_kWh as "max Einspeisen (kWh)"
From  `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) AND Einspeisen_kWh in 
	(SELECT max(Einspeisen_kWh)
     FROM `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
     Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
     Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP))
Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as Monat, avg(Einspeisen_kWh) as "mittel Einspeisen (kWh)"
From  `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as Monat, Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d') as "Datum max (PV)", PV_kWh as "max PV (kWh)"
From  `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) AND PV_kWh in 
	(SELECT max(PV_kWh)
     FROM `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
     Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
     Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP))
Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as Monat, avg(PV_kWh) as "mittel PV (kWh)"
From  `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as Monat, Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d') as "Datum max (AC)", PV_kWh as "max AC (kWh)"
From  `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) AND ac_kWh in 
	(SELECT max(ac_kWh)
     FROM `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
     Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
     Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP))
Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as Monat, avg(ac_kWh) as "mittel AC (kWh)"
From  `aggregate_WR_Daten_daily`
Where $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
Group by year(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  Year(TIMESTAMP) as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochFrom()+hour(min(TIMESTAMP))*3600 as time_sec,
  avg(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  avg(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  avg(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  avg(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Gsamt,
  (avg(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh)+avg(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh))/avg(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Autarkie
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
  DATE(TIMESTAMP) Between DATE(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-01-01")) AND DATE(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-12-31"))
GROUP BY HOUR(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  "AVG (per day)" as "type",
  year(TIMESTAMP) as "Datum",
  avg(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  avg(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  avg(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  avg(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  avg(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  avg(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  avg(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  avg(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  avg(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  avg(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (timerange)" as "type",
  year(TIMESTAMP) as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (overall)" as "type",
  year(TIMESTAMP) as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS Einspeisen,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauchsanteil,
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR output",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauch,
  sum(PV_kWh) as Ertrag
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(Rad1Energy*DWD_SIM_Rad_factor.$fitmethod)/1000 as Prognose
FROM DWD_SIM_Daten
Left Join DWD_SIM_Rad_factor on month=month(TIMESTAMP)
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(DCsim)/1000 as Prognose
FROM DWD_SIM_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Autarkie,
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS gesamt
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Autarkie" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "90%" AS metric,
  count(*) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  Autarkie >= 0.9 AND $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "80%" AS metric,
  count(*) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  Autarkie >= 0.8 AND $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "70%" AS metric,
  count(*) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  Autarkie >= 0.7 AND $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "50%" AS metric,
  count(*) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  Autarkie >= 0.5 AND $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "95%" AS metric,
  count(*) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  Autarkie >= 0.95 AND $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  max(ChargeCycles)-min(ChargeCycles) as value,
  "Lade Zyklen" as metrics
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  T1.time_sec as time_sec,
  sum(T1.cycles) as value,
  "Lade Zyklen" as metrics
FROM (
  SELECT
    time_sec,
    timestamp,
    max(ChargeCycles)-min(ChargeCycles) as cycles
  FROM WR_Daten
  WHERE
    $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
  GRoup BY to_days(timestamp)
  )T1
Where cycles<30
Group by $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) as "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) as "Bat Entnahme"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(ac_kWh)/sum(PV_kWh-BatLaden_kWh+BatEntladen_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat (DC/DC)",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat (incl WR)",
  avg(BatTemperature) as "Bat.Temperatur",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Anteil int. Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh-BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(PV_kWh) AS VerlustAnteil
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and DATE(TIMESTAMP) < curdate()
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat (Eigenverbrauch)" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
  HomeConsumptionBat_kWh>0 and PV_kWh=0 and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh)*sum(if(PV_kWh=0 AND BatEntLaden_kWh is not null,ac_kWh,0))/sum(if(PV_kWh=0 AND BatEntLaden_kWh is not null,BatEntLaden_kWh,0)) AS "Bat (DC/DC/AC)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh-BatLaden_frei_kWh)*sum(if(PV_kWh=0 AND BatEntLaden_kWh is not null,ac_kWh,0))/sum(if(PV_kWh=0 AND BatEntLaden_kWh is not null,BatEntLaden_kWh,0)) AS "Bat (Virt) (DC/DC/AC)"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh)*100/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS eff,
  avg(BatTemperature) as x_value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and DATE(TIMESTAMP) < curdate()
GROUP BY $grouping
Order BY x_value

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "mit Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "ohne Bat"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "mit Bat" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS "mit Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS "ohne Bat"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  min(T1.time_sec) as time_sec,
  avg(T1.val1) as "bei 100%",
  avg(T1.val2) as "unter 20%",
  avg(T1.val3) as "unter 5%"
FROM(
  SELECT
    TIMESTAMP,
    min(time_sec) as time_sec,
    COUNT(if(BatStateOfCharge > 99, 1, NULL))/60 as val1,
    COUNT(if(BatStateOfCharge < 20, 1, NULL))/60 as val2,
    COUNT(if(BatStateOfCharge <= 5, 1, NULL))/60 as val3
  FROM WR_Daten
  WHERE  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
  Group BY to_days(TIMESTAMP))T1
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  PV_kWh as value,
  "PV Power" as metric
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  -(BatEntladen_kWh) as value,
  "Bat Entladen" as metric
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  BatLaden_kWh as value,
  "Bat Laden" as metric
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Autarkie" AS metric,
  Autarkie AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
